name: Lieutenant Bokit
description:
Lieutenant Bokit is on a case. As a resourceful kid, help him solve it.

How to play

Interact with the world by "colliding" with objects and characters. When the game gives you options in a dialog, use the arrow indicated next to each option.

  • Computer: Use the arrows or WASD.
  • Mobile/Tablet: Drag your finger across the screen in the direction you want to move. You can keep your finger pressed to make larger movements
